breakfast.name: Huevos Rancheros with Shrimp
breakfast.preparation: Heat olive oil in a pan. Fry tortillas lightly. Top with black beans, fried eggs, shrimp, and salsa. Garnish with queso fresco and cilantro.
breakfast.nutritionalBenefits: Provides protein, fiber, and healthy fats. The shrimp adds lean protein and omega-3 fatty acids.
breakfast.healthNotes: Excellent start to the day for sustained energy and digestive support.

lunch.name: Mexican Shrimp Ceviche Salad
lunch.preparation: Combine shrimp, tomato, red onion, cucumber, cilantro, lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Mix well. Serve on a bed of lettuce leaves and top with avocado.
lunch.nutritionalBenefits: High in protein, vitamins, and minerals. Lime juice aids digestion.
lunch.healthNotes: The lime juice and fresh vegetables support healthy digestion and gut health.

dinner.name: Grilled Fish Tacos with Mango Salsa
ingredients: 1/4 cup mango salsa (mango, red onion, cilantro, lime juice)
dinner.preparation: Marinate fish in lime juice, olive oil, salt, and pepper. Grill fish until cooked through. Flake fish and serve in corn tortillas with shredded cabbage and mango salsa.
dinner.nutritionalBenefits: Provides lean protein, omega-3 fatty acids, and fiber. Mango salsa adds vitamins and antioxidants.
dinner.healthNotes: Easy to digest and provides essential nutrients for overall health. Choose whole grain tortillas for more fiber.

snacks.name: Spiced Pepitas
snacks.preparation: Toss pepitas with chili powder, cumin, and salt. Toast in a dry pan over medium heat until lightly browned and fragrant, stirring frequently.
snacks.nutritionalBenefits: Provides healthy fats, fiber, and magnesium.
snacks.healthNotes: Good for digestive health due to fiber content and healthy fats will keep Juli full.
